EmailTemplate.name: CSO - Forwarding Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NOTE TO AGENT (Delete this note BEFORE sending email): Copy and paste the ticket information in the subject Line: e.g. {Reference Ticket#:1-276MTM} Publications. Delete this paragraph BEFORE sending email.
DO NOT REPLY – This “From” address is NOT monitored.
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support. I am resending the attached email per your request.
Thank you, we appreciate your business!
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com
